show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Anti-Union Union?
content:
That Michigan became the 24th state to part ways with its die-hard union past and join the right-to-work club is... <!--more--> significant.
That the legislative “battle” was tidied up in just one day is even more so.
Leid Stories discusses Republican Gov.
Rick Snyder’s big win, how organized labor dropped the ball, and what it means to the Union, now truly divided into “red” and “blue” states.
Listeners offer their opinions and ideas on the subject and related issues.
